mapper.sql: sysitem_item.`item_id`, sysitem_item.`title`, sysitem_item.`cat_id`, syscategory_cat.`cat_name`, syscategory_cat.`parent_id`, syscategory_cat.`cat_path`, sysitem_item.`brand_id`, syscategory_brand.`brand_name`, sysitem_item.`price`, sysitem_item.`point`, sysitem_item.`cost_price`, sysitem_item.`mkt_price`, sysitem_item.`spec_desc`, sysitem_item.`image_default_id`, sysitem_item.`modified_time`, shop.shop_id, shop.shop_name, shop.shop_descript, shop.shop_logo, shop.status, shop.tally_score, shop.attitude_score, shop.delivery_speed_score, sysitem_item_count.`buy_count`, sysitem_item_count.`rate_count`, sysitem_item_count.`rate_good_count`, sysitem_item_count.`sold_quantity`, sysitem_item_count.`view_count`, s_user_fav.fav_count, sysitem_item_status.`list_time`, sysitem_item_status.`approve_status`

sysitem_item LEFT JOIN sysitem_item_count ON sysitem_item.`item_id` = sysitem_item_count.`item_id` LEFT JOIN sysitem_item_status ON sysitem_item.`item_id` = sysitem_item_status.`item_id` LEFT JOIN syscategory_cat ON sysitem_item.`cat_id` = syscategory_cat.`cat_id` LEFT JOIN syscategory_brand ON sysitem_item.`brand_id` = syscategory_brand.`brand_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT ss.shop_id, ss.shop_name, ss.shop_descript, ss.shop_logo, ss.status, s_score.tally_score, s_score.attitude_score, s_score.delivery_speed_score FROM sysshop_shop ss LEFT JOIN (SELECT shop_id, user_id, tally_score, attitude_score, delivery_speed_score, logistics_service_score, disabled FROM sysrate_score GROUP BY shop_id) s_score ON ss.shop_id = s_score.shop_id) shop ON sysitem_item.`shop_id` = shop.`shop_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) fav_count FROM sysuser_user_fav GROUP BY item_id) s_user_fav ON sysitem_item.`item_id` = s_user_fav.item_id WHERE (1) AND sysitem_item.`use_platform` IN ('0', '1') AND sysitem_item.`check_status` = '1' AND sysitem_item_status.`approve_status` = 'onsale' AND shop.shop_id != 178
